info.title: Writer Completion v2
info.description: Generate texts, prompts and chat with confidence through the help of Writer.com, the integrated platform designed for accuracy and security.

get.description: List name and ID of available AI models.

text.description: The generated text output from the model, which forms the main content of the response.
text.title: Text

log_probs.description: Object containing information about log probabilities.
log_probs.title: Log probabilities

choices.description: A list of choices generated by the model, each containing the text of the completion and associated metadata such as log probabilities.
choices.title: Choices

model.description: The identifier of the model that was used to generate the responses in the 'choices' array.
model.title: Model

post.description: Generate text based on the input parameters provided.

model.description: The identifier of the model to be used for processing the request.
model.title: Model

prompt.description: The input text that the model will process to generate a response.
prompt.title: Prompt

max_tokens.description: The maximum number of tokens that the model can generate in the response.
max_tokens.title: Max tokens

temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the model's outputs. Higher values lead to more random outputs, while lower values make the model more deterministic.
temperature.title: Temperature

stream.description: Determines whether the model's output should be streamed. If true, the output is generated and sent incrementally, which can be useful for real-time applications.
stream.title: Stream

random_seed.description: A seed used to initialize the random number generator for the model, ensuring reproducibility of the output when the same inputs are provided.
random_seed.title: Random seed

id.description: A globally unique identifier (UUID) for the response generated by the API.
id.title: Id

finish_reason.description: Describes the condition under which the model ceased generating content.
finish_reason.title: Finish reason

content.description: The text content produced by the model. This field contains the actual output generated, reflecting the model's response to the input query or command.
content.title: Content

role.description: Specifies the role associated with the content, indicating whether the message is from the 'assistant' or another defined role, helping to contextualize the output within the interaction flow.
role.title: Role

choices.description: An array of objects representing the different outcomes or results produced by the model based on the input provided.
choices.title: Choices

created.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the response was created.
created.title: Created

model.description: Identifies the specific model used to generate the response.
model.title: Model

post.description: Facilitates engaging and dynamic conversations between a user and an AI-assisted chat model.

model.description: Specifies the model to be used for generating responses.
model.title: Model

temperature.description: Controls the randomness or creativity of the model's responses. A higher temperature results in more varied and less predictable text, while a lower temperature produces more deterministic and conservative outputs.
temperature.title: Temperature

max_tokens.description: Defines the maximum number of tokens (words and characters) that the model can generate in the response.
max_tokens.title: Max tokens

n.description: Specifies the number of completions (responses) to generate from the model in a single request. This parameter allows multiple responses to be generated, offering a variety of potential replies from which to choose.
n.title: N

stream.description: Indicates whether the response should be streamed incrementally as it is generated or only returned once fully complete.
stream.title: Stream

role.description: Role to whom the given message content belongs to.
role.title: Role

content.description: Content of the conversation history or context for the model to respond to.
content.title: Content
